articles.title: Huawei says it will start selling PCs powered by Intel's AI chip - Nikkei Asia
articles.description: MateBook X Pro features HarmonyOS and Pangu LLM, both developed in-house
articles.content: TAIPEI -- China's Huawei Technologies on Thursday unveiled its first artificial intelligence-powered PC, saying it will be equipped with Intel's latest chipset and run on its in-house operating syste… [+137 chars]
